content:
Just to let you all know that the FHIR Toolkit it starting to get more functional. right now, you can:
- connect to servers, and search them (including registry.fhir.org)
- open, edit and save resources from servers or files:
-- code systems, value sets, capability statements, and questionnaires
- test smart on fhir login (including backend services)
you can get the toolkit - runs on both windows and OSX - from http://www.healthintersections.com.au/FhirServer
